aves.dpt.intf.viewers

Interface DataViewer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataViewerImpl

    public interface DataViewer
    A basic interface for a viewer specialized in displaying DOCUMENTS. Classes implementing this interface can be called by a AvesViewer to display different types of DOCUMENTS.
    Author:
    svlieffe 2012/03/29

    • Nested Class Summary
